description: Instant Pot Red Lentil Butternut Squash Curry. This Warming lentil butternut or pumpkin curry is creamy and comforting. 1 Pot, make in a Pressure cooker or Saucepan. Vegan Glutenfree Soyfree nutfree Recipe
keywords: butternut squash lentil curry, butternut squash red lentil soup, lentil butternut squash
name: Instant Pot Lentil Butternut Squash Curry
recipeIngredient: 1/4 tsp black pepper (or cayenne, or both)
12 oz butternut squash (or pumpkin) raw, peeled and cubed or frozen)
lime juice and cilantro for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Start the Instant Pot on saut√©. Add the oil and once it has heated, add the mustard seeds and wait for them to sputter or change color. Add the chopped onion, garlic, ginger, chili and a pinch of salt. Cook for 2 minutes.
Add the spices and mix well. Add the tomatoes and a quarter cup of water and cook for 2 minutes stirring occasionally to avoid sticking.

Add the butternut squash or pumpkin, coconut milk, lentils, water and salt. Mix well to combine and pick up the tomato from the bottom of the pot. Close the lid and pressure cook for 4 minutes. Carefully quick release the pressure slowly once cooking time is done.

Open the lid and fold in the spinach and mix thoroughly. Taste and adjust the amount of salt, heat and flavor. Add a good dash of lime juice. Garnish with pepper flakes or cilantro. Serve over rice or flat bread or with fresh dinner rolls.

video.description:
Instant Pot Red Lentil Butternut Squash Curry. 1 Pot 30 Min. Saucepan option. 
FULL RECIPE == https://www.veganricha.com/2018/10/instant-pot-red-lentil-butternut-squash-curry.html

This Warming lentil butternut or pumpkin curry is creamy and comforting. Make in a Pressure cooker or Saucepan. Add spices of choice. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free nut-free Recipe.

This Lentil Butternut Squash Dal comes together very quickly. Add coconut milk for creamy curry, Use water or broth for an everyday Dal. 
My Books: https://veganricha.com/books

Music: Joakim Karud
